name: large_workload
description: Large benchmark workload for comprehensive stress testing
prompts: Write a detailed essay on the impact of artificial intelligence on modern society, covering both benefits and potential risks.
Explain the mathematical foundations of deep learning, including gradient descent and loss functions.
Describe the history and evolution of cloud computing from mainframes to modern distributed systems.
What are the key principles of sustainable development and how can they be implemented in urban planning?
Explain how cryptographic hash functions work and their applications in cybersecurity.
Discuss the ethical considerations in genetic engineering and CRISPR technology.
How do modern search engines work? Explain the indexing and ranking algorithms.
Describe the physics of black holes and their role in our understanding of the universe.
What are microservices architecture and how do they differ from monolithic applications?
Explain the mechanisms of vaccine development and the process of clinical trials.
How does quantum entanglement work and what are its potential applications?
Describe the economic theories behind monetary policy and central banking.
What is natural language processing and how do large language models understand text?
Explain the carbon cycle and its importance in climate regulation.
How do autonomous vehicles navigate and make decisions in real-time?
